name: R4B-DeviceMetric-R5-DeviceMetric
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B DeviceMetric into FHIR R5

element.display: Measurement, calculation or setting capability of a medical device

target.display: Measurement, calculation or setting capability of a medical device
target.comment: R4B `DeviceMetric` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric`

element.display: Describes the calibrations that have been performed or that are required to be performed

target.display: Describes the calibrations that have been performed or that are required to be performed
target.comment: R4B `DeviceMetric.calibration` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration`

R4B `DeviceMetric.calibration.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `DeviceMetric.calibration.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `DeviceMetric.calibration.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `DeviceMetric.calibration.state` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.state` - state has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-calibration-state|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-calibration-state|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Describes the time last calibration has been performed

target.display: Describes the time last calibration has been performed
target.comment: R4B `DeviceMetric.calibration.time` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.time`

R4B `DeviceMetric.calibration.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.calibration.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-calibration-type|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-calibration-type|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

R4B `DeviceMetric.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.category` - category has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-category|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-category|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: black | red | green | yellow | blue | magenta | cyan | white

target.comment: R4B `DeviceMetric.color` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DeviceMetric.color` - (color failed to compare required binding of http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-color|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/color-codes|5.0.0)
R4B `DeviceMetric.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.contained`
R4B `DeviceMetric.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DeviceMetric.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `DeviceMetric.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.id`
R4B `DeviceMetric.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `DeviceMetric.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.implicitRules`
R4B `DeviceMetric.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DeviceMetric.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `DeviceMetric.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.meta`

R4B `DeviceMetric.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DeviceMetric.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `DeviceMetric.operationalStatus` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.operationalStatus` - operationalStatus has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-operational-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/metric-operational-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Describes the link to the parent Device
Describes the link to the source Device
Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `DeviceMetric.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.text`

element.display: Identity of metric, for example Heart Rate or PEEP Setting

target.display: Identity of metric, for example Heart Rate or PEEP Setting
target.comment: R4B `DeviceMetric.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.type`

element.display: Unit of Measure for the Metric

target.display: Unit of Measure for the Metric
target.comment: R4B `DeviceMetric.unit` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DeviceMetric.unit`
